article.title: Teledyne to Provide Radar Equipment
article.text: Teledyne Microwave Solutions, Rancho Cordova, Calif., is being awarded a $49,152,320 firm-fixed-price requirements contract for the repair of 1,600 10 KT traveling wave tubes for the AN-SPY-1 radar program within the AEGIS weapon system. NAVSUP Weapon Systems Support, Mechanicsburg, Pa., is the contracting activity (N00104-14-D-D002).
